ComicInfo.Series: DC Horror Presents: The Conjuring: The Lover
ComicInfo.Summary:
The fear-soaked finale!
Manipulated by the Occultist, Jessica has done the unthinkable and murdered her best friend, but her torments are far from over.
Then, in our final terrifying trip into the haunted artifact room, Domo Stanton tells the heart-stopping tale of the Occultist’s Chalice!
